title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate with valid credentials and appropriate roles are assigned.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click login button
Verify successful login and redirection to dashboard page
Verify user has correct role-based access to authorized modules

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the system prevents login with invalid credentials and returns proper error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email and/or password
Click login button
Verify login is rejected with appropriate error message
Verify no access to any protected resource without login

title: Dashboard KPI Display and Trend Analysis
description: Verify KPIs are correctly calculated, displayed, and trend charts update according to data changes on the dashboard.

steps.description: Login with authorized user
Navigate to dashboard page
Verify KPIs are accurately displayed with correct values
Verify KPI trend charts render correctly and reflect data changes
Update KPI data in KPI module
Verify dashboard refreshes and KPIs/trends update accordingly

title: KPI Module - Define, Update and Analyze KPIs
description: Validate the process of creating, editing, and analyzing KPIs with target goals and correct trend calculations.

steps.description: Login with KPI manager role
Open KPI module
Create new KPI with valid data including targets
Verify new KPI is saved and listed with correct values
Edit existing KPI to update values and target
Verify KPI updates are saved and trend/analysis data is recalculated
View KPI details and trend analytics
Verify trends accurately reflect historical data

title: Quality Cost Management - Entry and Categorization
description: Test recording of quality cost entries with correct classification of internal failure, external failure, prevention and appraisal costs.

steps.description: Login with quality cost manager role
Navigate to Quality Cost Management module
Add new quality cost entry specifying category and cost details
Verify entry is saved and reflected in cost lists and summary
Filter and sort cost entries by category and date
Verify filtering returns correct sets of records

title: 8D Problem Solving Workflow and Closure
description: Verify recording of non-conformities, stepwise 8D problem-solving process tracking and closure processes.

steps.description: Login as quality engineer
Open DF & 8D Management module
Register a new non-conformity with required details
Verify non-conformity is created and visible in non-conformity list
Progress through all 8D steps entering necessary data and updating status
Verify each 8D step data is saved and visible
Close non-conformity after completing all problem-solving steps
Verify non-conformity status changes to closed and appears in closure reports

title: Quarantine Management Flow
description: Test quarantine material/product registration, tracking and release with correct status updates.

steps.description: Login with quarantine coordinator role
Navigate to Quarantine Management module
Register a new quarantine item with material/product details
Verify quarantine item appears in quarantine list with correct status
Update quarantine status to hold, testing or release states accordingly
Verify status updates reflect correctly in quarantine detail view

title: Internal Audit Planning, Execution and Reporting
description: Validate audit creation, scheduling, performing, finding logging, corrective action linkage and report generation workflows.

steps.description: Login as internal audit team member
Open Internal Audit Management module
Create and schedule a new audit plan
Verify audit plan is saved and listed in schedule
Execute audit, logging findings via audit findings interface
Verify findings are recorded and linked to audit
Generate audit report from findings
Verify audit reports accurately reflect findings and corrective actions

title: Supplier Quality Evaluations and Performance Tracking
description: Test supplier evaluation creation, audit record keeping and monitoring supplier performance metrics.

steps.description: Login as supplier quality manager
Access Supplier Quality Management module
Add a new supplier evaluation record with scores
Verify new evaluation is saved and visible
Log supplier audit findings and non-conformities
Verify audit records and NCs link correctly to supplier profile
Review supplier performance dashboard
Verify performance metrics reflect evaluations and audit data

title: Customer Complaint Lifecycle Management
description: Verify complete lifecycle of customer complaints including logging, analysis, communications, actions and document management.

steps.description: Log in as customer service representative
Navigate to Customer Complaints Management module
Create a new customer complaint with associated details
Verify complaint is listed in complaints dashboard
Perform complaint analysis and add corrective actions
Verify actions are linked to complaint and status is updated
Send and log complaint related communications
Verify communication entries are saved correctly
Upload and view complaint related documents
Verify documents are stored, versioned and previewable as PDFs

title: Deviation Reporting, Approval and Source Integration
description: Validate that production/process deviations are reported, reviewed, approved and integrated with source records correctly.

steps.description: Login as deviation manager
Open Deviation Management module
Create a new deviation record describing the issue and affected process
Verify deviation is listed and detailed correctly
Submit deviation for approval workflow
Verify approval status changes and notifications are triggered
Select and link appropriate source records to deviation
Verify source record integration is saved and displayed

title: Incoming Quality Inspection and Risk Stock Alerts
description: Test incoming material inspections, control plan management, INKR records, and risk stock alert functionality.

steps.description: Login as incoming quality inspector
Access Incoming Quality Control module
Create new inspection record with results
Verify inspection record is saved and appears in inspection lists
Configure or update control plans for materials
Verify control plans reflect properly in material inspection workflow
Check INKR records for inspection
Verify INKR data consistency
Trigger risk stock alerts via stock level modifications
Verify risk stock alerts appear on dashboard or stock control views

title: Equipment and Calibration Scheduling with History Tracking
description: Verify equipment and calibration record creation, scheduling, assignment history and maintenance plan accuracy.

steps.description: Login as equipment manager
Open Equipment & Calibration Management module
Add new equipment record with relevant details
Verify equipment appears in equipment list and dashboard
Schedule calibration and maintenance tasks for equipment
Verify calibration schedules appear correctly and notifications are generated
Assign equipment to personnel and view assignment history
Verify assignment history is recorded and shown correctly
Review calibration history for equipment
Verify calibration records and dates are accurately maintained

title: Produced Vehicles Quality Tracking and Defect Reporting
description: Test vehicle quality record creation, defect tracking and report generation related to produced vehicles.

steps.description: Login as vehicle quality inspector
Open Produced Vehicles Management module
Create a new vehicle quality record
Verify vehicle record is saved and appears in vehicle list
Log vehicle defects and link them to vehicle record
Verify defects are tracked accurately and linked
Generate vehicle quality reports
Verify reports display accurate defect and quality data

title: Document Upload, Version Control and PDF Viewing
description: Validate quality document upload, version management, and in-app PDF viewing functionality.

steps.description: Login with document management rights
Open Document Management module
Upload a new quality document
Verify document appears in document list with metadata
Upload a new version of an existing document
Verify version increment and version history are stored
Open document in PDF viewer modal
Verify PDF renders correctly without errors

title: Training Records and Certification Tracking
description: Test adding training sessions, linking personnel, and managing certifications with expiry dates.

steps.description: Login as HR/training coordinator
Open Training Management module
Create a new training session with details
Verify training session is saved and visible
Assign training to personnel
Verify personnel training records updated accordingly
Add and track certification details including expiry dates
Verify certifications are linked and upcoming expirations are flagged

title: Polyvalence Matrix Skill and Competence Management
description: Verify skill entries, competence levels, and personnel skill matrices can be created and viewed accurately.

steps.description: Login as skill matrix manager
Open Polyvalence Matrix module
Add new skill definitions with levels
Verify skills appear in skill management list
Assign skill levels to personnel
Verify personnel skill matrix updates accordingly
View polyvalence dashboard
Verify skill and competence visualizations display correct data

title: Benchmark Management and Industry Comparison
description: Validate addition of benchmark data, comparison against industry standards, filtering and report generation.

steps.description: Login as benchmark manager
Open Benchmark Management module
Create new benchmark record with relevant metrics
Verify benchmark saved and appears in list
Filter and sort benchmark records
Verify correct filtered data is returned
Perform industry comparison analysis
Verify analysis results reflect accurate comparative insights

title: WPS Management - Procedures and Qualifications
description: Test creation and management of Welding Procedure Specifications and qualification records.

steps.description: Login as welding manager
Access WPS Management module
Add new welding procedure specification
Verify WPS is saved and visible in list
Add qualification records linked to procedures
Verify qualifications are correctly stored and linked

title: Kaizen Management - Submission, Evaluation and Closure
description: Validate submitting improvement proposals, evaluation workflow and tracking implementation completion.

steps.description: Login as improvement team member
Open Kaizen Management module
Submit a new Kaizen proposal with description and expected benefits
Verify proposal is saved and visible in list
Perform evaluation and update status
Verify evaluation data saved and displayed
Mark proposal as implemented and close
Verify status reflects successful implementation closure

title: Task Management - Creation, Assignment and Completion Tracking
description: Verify tasks can be created, assigned to users, status updated and tracked through completion.

steps.description: Login as task manager
Open Task Management module
Create a new task with title, description and priority
Verify task appears in task board
Assign task to user(s)
Verify assigned users appear correctly
Update task status step by step to completion
Verify status changes and completion reflected in UI and reports

title: Audit Log System - User Activity Recording and Retrieval
description: Test audit log recording for user actions, changes and verify logs can be retrieved and filtered securely.

steps.description: Login as admin or security officer
Perform various system actions (create, update, delete records)
Access Audit Log System module
Verify user activities are correctly logged with timestamp and details
Filter audit logs by user, date range and action type
Verify filtering returns accurate subset of logs

title: Settings & Configuration Management
description: Verify adding, updating and deleting system configurations including cost settings, personnel, customers and accounts.

steps.description: Login as system administrator
Open Settings & Configuration modules for cost, personnel, customer and account management
Add new configuration entries such as cost categories, personnel or customers
Verify new entries are saved and listed
Update existing configuration entries
Verify updates persist and are reflected in dependent modules
Delete configuration entries and confirm removal
Verify deletion is successful and does not break system functionality

title: Reporting & PDF Generation Accuracy and Export
description: Validate reports accurate data display and successful PDF generation and export from dashboards and lists.

steps.description: Login with report viewing rights
Generate various standard reports from dashboard and respective modules
Verify report data is correct and matches underlying source data
Export reports and dashboards to PDF format
Verify generated PDF files open correctly and data is formatted as per requirements
Test printing reports from PDF output
Verify print views are correctly formatted without data truncation

title: Global Data Context and State Consistency
description: Verify that shared data context maintains consistent data flow and state updates reflect across modules correctly.

steps.description: Login and open multiple modules simultaneously
Update shared data (e.g., user info, KPIs) in one module
Verify data updates are reflected correctly across other modules in real time
Perform state changes and navigations
Verify no state desynchronization or stale data issues occur

title: UI Component Reusability and Consistency
description: Test core UI components (buttons, forms, modals, dropdowns) for functionality and visual consistency across the system.

steps.description: Load various screens featuring shared UI components
Verify components function correctly including input, selection, and modal opening/closing
Verify consistent styling, responsiveness and accessibility compliance

title: Input Validation and Error Handling Across Forms
description: Verify input validation rules work, error messages display properly and invalid data is rejected on all data entry forms.

steps.description: Attempt to submit empty or invalid inputs on key forms like login, KPI, quality cost, audit and complaints
Verify validation errors appear near inputs and form submission prevented
Enter inputs exceeding length limits or invalid formats
Verify error messages prevent acceptance of invalid data

title: Role-Based Permission Enforcement
description: Ensure users cannot access modules or actions outside of their role permissions and unauthorized requests are blocked.

steps.description: Login as user with limited role
Attempt to access restricted modules or perform unauthorized actions
Verify system denies access and shows appropriate error or redirects
Perform authorized actions
Verify permitted actions succeed without permission errors
